languages.text: "Это и твоя семья, Абеляр!" {n}Слова женщины вспыхивают вызовом.{/n} "Прошу прощения, мне не стоит терять самообладания. Никто из рода Версериан не причастен к заговору против Вашей Светлости. Честь и верность никогда не были пустым звуком для нас и мы точно знаем, кому служим".

traits.locale_text: "Это и твоя семья, Абеляр". {n}Слова женщины вспыхивают вызовом, но она поспешно переводит дыхание.{/n} "Прошу прощения, мне не стоит терять самообладания. Никто из рода Версериан не причастен к заговору против Вашей Светлости. Честь и верность никогда не были пустым звуком для нас и мы точно знаем, кому служим".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."
languages.original_text: "Это и твоя семья, Абеляр!" {n}Слова женщины вспыхивают вызовом.{/n} "Прошу прощения, мне не стоит терять самообладания. Никто из рода Версериан не причастен к заговору против Вашей Светлости. Честь и верность никогда не были пустым звуком для нас и мы точно знаем, кому служим".

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, this is your family as well, you know!" {n}The woman's words fire up in defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. None of the House Werserian members are involved in the conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not an empty sound for us and we know for sure the one who we serve."
traits.speaker: Clemence

None of the House Werserian members are involved in the conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not an empty sound for us and we know for sure the one who we serve."

None of the House Werserian members are involved in the conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly and we know for sure the one who we serve."

None of the House Werserian members are involved in the conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly and we know for sure the one who we serve."

No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「アベラルド、これはあなたの一族の問題でもあるの、わかっているでしょう！」{n}女性の言葉には反抗に燃えている。{/n}「申し訳ありません…冷静さを欠くべきではありませんね。ウェルザリアン家の面々は誰一人として、陛下に反逆する陰謀に関与しておりません。栄誉と忠誠を軽んじてはおりません。己が仕えている相手をしかと認識しております」
languages.original_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、これはあなたの一族の問題でもあるの、わかっているでしょう！」{n}女性の言葉には反抗に燃えている。{/n}「申し訳ありません…冷静さを欠くべきではありませんね。ウェルザリアン家の面々は誰一人として、陛下に反逆する陰謀に関与しておりません。栄誉と忠誠を軽んじてはおりません。己が仕えている相手をしかと認識しております」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，他们也是你的家人啊！你很了解他们！”{n}克莱门缇雅怒气冲冲地还嘴。{/n}“请原谅，我的情绪有些失控了。韦尔森家族绝没有任何人参与针对行商浪人的阴谋。我们重视荣誉与忠诚，我们也很清楚谁才是我们的主人。”
languages.original_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，他们也是你的家人啊！你很了解他们！”{n}克莱门缇雅怒气冲冲地还嘴。{/n}“请原谅，我的情绪有些失控了。韦尔森家族绝没有任何人参与针对行商浪人的阴谋。我们重视荣誉与忠诚，我们也知道谁是我们真正侍奉的主人。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Abélard, c'est de ta propre famille que tu parles ! » {n}s'exclame Clémentia avec une attitude de défi avant de se ressaisir.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Je ne devrais pas m'emporter de la sorte. Non, aucun des membres de la maison Werserian n'est impliqué dans un quelconque complot visant Sa Seigneurie. Dans notre famille, nous ne prenons pas l'honneur et la loyauté à la légère. Nous ne servons {mf|nul|nulle} autre que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: « Abélard, c'est de ta propre famille que tu parles ! {n}s'exclame Clémentia avec une attitude de défi avant de se ressaisir.{/n} Pardonnez-moi. Je ne devrais pas m'emporter de la sorte. Non, aucun des membres de la maison Werserian n'est impliqué dans un quelconque complot visant Sa Seigneurie. Dans notre famille, nous ne prenons pas l'honneur et la loyauté à la légère. Nous ne servons {mf|nul|nulle} autre que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Abelard, esta también es su familia, ¿sabe?». {n}Las palabras de la mujer rebosan desafío.{/n} «Disculpe, no debería perder la compostura. Ninguno de los miembros de la casa Werserian está involucrado en la conspiración contra mi{mf|lord|lady}. El honor y la lealtad no son cosas que nos tomemos a la ligera y sabemos a quién servimos».
languages.original_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: «Abelard, esta también es su familia, ¿sabe?». {n}Las palabras de la mujer rebosan desafío.{/n} «Disculpe, no debería perder la compostura. Ninguno de los miembros de la casa Werserian está involucrado en la conspiración contra mi{mf|lord|lady}. El honor y la lealtad no son cosas que nos tomemos a la ligera y sabemos con certeza a quién servimos».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Abelard, das ist auch Eure Familie, wisst Ihr!" {n}Die Worte der Frau brennen vor Trotz.{/n} "Verzeiht, ich sollte nicht die Beherrschung verlieren. Keines der Mitglieder von Haus Werserian ist an der Verschwörung gegen {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} beteiligt. Wir nehmen Ehre und Loyalität sehr ernst, und wir wissen selbstverständlich, wem wir dienen."
languages.original_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, das ist auch Eure Familie, wisst Ihr!" {n}Die Worte der Frau triefen vor Trotz.{/n} "Verzeiht, ich sollte nicht die Beherrschung verlieren. Keines der Mitglieder von Haus Werserian ist an der Verschwörung gegen {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} beteiligt. Wir nehmen Ehre und Loyalität sehr ernst, und wir wissen selbstverständlich, wem wir dienen."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Abelard, sen de bu hanedensin ya!" {n}Kadının isyankâr sözleri, ateş gibi püskürüyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz, kendimi böyle kaybetmemeliydim. Werserian Hanesi'nden hiç kimse, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne karşı bir entrikaya karışmamıştır. Onuru ve sadakati ciddiye alırız. Kime hizmet ettiğimizi de iyi biliyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Abelard, it is your family too, you know!" {n}The woman's words burn with defiance.{/n} "My apologies — I should not lose my composure. No member of House Werserian is involved in a conspiracy against {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. Honour and loyalty are not something we take lightly, and we know whom we serve."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, sen de bu hanedensin ya!" {n}Kadının isyan eden sözleri ateş gibi püskürüyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz, kendimi böyle kaybetmemeliydim. Werserian Hanesi'nden kimse {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne karşı bir entrikaya karışmamıştır. Onur ve sadakat, hafife aldığımız şeyler değil. Kime hizmet ettiğimizi de iyi biliyoruz."
traits.speaker: Clemence
